full_summary:
================

### Tender Announcement

**Title**: Media Preparator
**Reference Number**: WS3545107316-Doc3973008144
**Solicitation Number**: WS3545107316

**Publication Date**: April 27, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: May 12, 2023, 14:00 EDT
**Expected Contract Start Date**: August 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: August 21, 2023

### Description

The Public Health Agency of Canada, located in Winnipeg, Manitoba, is seeking a supplier to provide and install one (1) Automatic microbiological media preparator. The delivery date for the equipment is March 31, 2024.

**Procurement Method**
 Competitive - Open bidding

**Trade Agreements**
 Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Requirements

* Supply and installation of one (1) Automatic microbiological media preparator
* Delivery of the equipment by March 31, 2024
* Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by 02:00 PM EDT on May 12, 2024.

### Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Point of Contact
Christopher (SPAC/PSPC), christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16121827?extsite=MTYxMjE4MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Important Notes

* Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Buyandsell posting closing time.
* All bids submitted after 02:00 PM EDT on May 12, 2024, will be declared non-responsive.
